title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: An open-world fantasy RPG where Geralt of Rivia searches for his adopted daughter while navigating war and monsters.

title: Elden Ring
description: A massive open-world action RPG developed by FromSoftware and George R.R. Martin.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
description: An open-world sci-fi RPG set in Night City, where players explore a dystopian future of cybernetic implants and corporations.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Epic western adventure following Arthur Morgan and the Van der Linde gang in a changing America.

title: God of War
description: Kratos embarks on a journey with his son Atreus through Norse mythology in this action epic.

title: Hades
description: Battle your way out of the Underworld as Zagreus, son of Hades, in this roguelike masterpiece.

title: Stardew Valley
description: A cozy farming RPG where you restore your grandfather’s farm, build relationships, and explore caves.

title: Baldur’s Gate 3
description: A deep narrative-driven RPG set in the Dungeons & Dragons universe with branching choices and tactical combat.

title: Hogwarts Legacy
description: An open-world RPG set in the wizarding world of Harry Potter, allowing players to live their own magical adventure.

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
description: A reimagining of the survival horror classic where Leon S. Kennedy rescues the President’s daughter from a sinister cult.

title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
description: A shinobi embarks on a mission of revenge in late 1500s Japan. Punishing combat, stealth, and exploration.

title: Assassin’s Creed Valhalla
description: Play as Eivor, a Viking raider exploring England’s dark ages in this expansive open-world RPG.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Follow three criminals as they commit heists in the sprawling open world of Los Santos.

title: Fallout 4
description: Explore the post-apocalyptic ruins of Boston and build your own settlements in this massive RPG.

title: Skyrim
description: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim offers limitless adventures across the northern realm of Tamriel.

title: DOOM Eternal
description: Fast-paced, brutal FPS action where you battle demons from Hell to save humanity.

title: Overwatch 2
description: Team-based hero shooter with fast-paced gameplay and unique characters.

title: Minecraft
description: Creative sandbox game allowing players to build, explore, and survive in blocky worlds.

title: Terraria
description: 2D adventure game combining building, crafting, combat, and exploration.

title: Hollow Knight
description: A beautifully hand-drawn metroidvania filled with mysterious bugs and challenging bosses.

title: Dark Souls III
description: The final chapter of the Dark Souls series, featuring brutal combat and intricate world design.

title: Forza Horizon 5
description: Explore the vibrant landscapes of Mexico in this open-world racing experience.

title: Battlefield 2042
description: Futuristic large-scale warfare featuring up to 128 players, vehicles, and dynamic weather.

title: Call of Duty: Modern Warfare II
description: The sequel to the 2019 reboot, featuring intense campaign missions and multiplayer modes.

title: Alan Wake 2
description: A psychological horror sequel that blends storytelling, mystery, and survival horror.

title: Lies of P
description: A dark Souls-like inspired by Pinocchio, with challenging combat and gothic visuals.

title: Dead Space (Remake)
description: A complete remake of the sci-fi horror classic, with modern graphics and immersive sound.

title: Control
description: A supernatural third-person action game set in a shifting government building known as the Oldest House.

title: The Last of Us Part I
description: A remake of the classic story-driven action game about survival and human connection.

title: Ghost of Tsushima
description: An open-world samurai epic set in feudal Japan as Jin Sakai fights to defend his homeland.

title: Death Stranding
description: Traverse a fragmented America as Sam Porter Bridges, reconnecting humanity through deliveries.

title: Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered
description: Play as Peter Parker in this action-packed superhero adventure set in New York City.

title: Hitman 3
description: The conclusion to the World of Assassination trilogy, featuring open-ended stealth missions.

title: Returnal
description: A sci-fi roguelike where an astronaut relives a deadly time loop on an alien planet.

title: Far Cry 6
description: A revolution-themed shooter set in the fictional Caribbean island of Yara ruled by a dictator.

title: Dying Light 2 Stay Human
description: A zombie parkour action game set in a vast post-apocalyptic city.

title: Assassin’s Creed Mirage
description: Return to the franchise’s roots in this stealth-focused adventure set in Baghdad.

title: Starfield
description: A next-generation space RPG from Bethesda featuring over 1000 explorable planets.

title: Diablo IV
description: The legendary action RPG returns with a dark open world and deep character customization.

title: The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
description: Sequel to Breath of the Wild, offering new mechanics and expanded exploration.

title: Horizon Forbidden West
description: Aloy journeys into the west to uncover secrets about the ancient world and new machines.

title: Resident Evil Village
description: Ethan Winters faces new horrors in a mysterious European village.

title: Cuphead
description: Challenging run-and-gun platformer inspired by 1930s animation and jazz music.

title: It Takes Two
description: A cooperative action-adventure about a couple navigating imaginative worlds to fix their relationship.

title: Celeste
description: A challenging indie platformer about climbing a mountain and facing inner struggles.

title: Slay the Spire
description: A roguelike deck-building card game that challenges players to craft strategies through procedural dungeons.

title: Undertale
description: An RPG where no one has to die. Battle or befriend monsters in a witty, emotional story.

title: Dead Cells
description: A roguelike metroidvania where you fight, die, and try again with procedural levels and fluid combat.

title: Hollow Knight: Silksong
description: Sequel to Hollow Knight — explore new kingdoms, battle new foes, and uncover secrets as Hornet.

title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
description: A dark, randomly generated roguelike shooter filled with monsters, upgrades, and secrets.

title: Limbo
description: A monochromatic puzzle-platformer exploring themes of loss, death, and mystery.

title: Subnautica
description: Explore an alien ocean world full of danger and beauty in this underwater survival adventure.

title: Outer Wilds
description: A space exploration game where you unravel the mysteries of a solar system trapped in a time loop.

title: No Man’s Sky
description: Explore an infinite procedurally generated universe filled with planets, lifeforms, and mysteries.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: Ellie embarks on a harrowing journey of revenge in a world ravaged by infection and moral decay.

title: Assassin’s Creed Odyssey
description: Play as a mercenary in ancient Greece, shaping history in a vast open-world RPG adventure.

title: Far Cry 5
description: Fight a doomsday cult in rural Montana in this chaotic open-world shooter.

title: Civilization VI
description: Build an empire to stand the test of time in this grand turn-based strategy classic.

title: Total War: Warhammer III
description: A massive strategy game combining real-time battles and empire management in the Warhammer universe.

title: Monster Hunter: World
description: Hunt giant monsters in a lush living ecosystem either solo or in online co-op.

title: Alan Wake Remastered
description: A remaster of the psychological thriller about a writer trapped in his own nightmare.

title: Persona 5 Royal
description: Stylish turn-based JRPG following a group of rebellious students in Tokyo.

title: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade
description: A reimagining of the JRPG classic with stunning visuals and action-oriented combat.

title: Resident Evil 2 (Remake)
description: Reimagining of the survival horror classic with stunning graphics and modern gameplay.

title: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
description: Continue Cal Kestis’ journey in a cinematic action-adventure with improved combat and exploration.

title: Monster Hunter Rise
description: Fast-paced monster hunting with new wirebug mobility and Palamute companions.

title: Nier: Automata
description: A stylish action RPG blending philosophy, multiple endings, and PlatinumGames combat.

title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain
description: Open-world stealth action where Big Boss leads Diamond Dogs in a tale of vengeance.

title: The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings
description: Geralt gets entangled in political intrigue and monster contracts in this mature RPG.

title: BioShock Infinite
description: A mind-bending shooter set in a floating city with unforgettable characters and story.

title: Mass Effect Legendary Edition
description: Remastered trilogy of the beloved sci-fi RPG series with improved visuals and QoL.

title: Dragon Age: Inquisition
description: Lead the Inquisition to save Thedas in this expansive fantasy RPG.

title: Papers, Please
description: Play as an immigration inspector in a dystopian country; decide who gets in.

title: Disco Elysium: The Final Cut
description: A groundbreaking narrative RPG about a detective with a unique skill system and choices.

title: The Outer Worlds
description: A quirky sci-fi RPG where your choices carry serious consequences across space colonies.

title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
description: A realistic, historically grounded RPG set in medieval Bohemia.

title: Mafia: Definitive Edition
description: A faithful remake of the 2002 classic, telling Tommy Angelo’s rise in the mob.

title: Marvel’s Spider-Man 2
description: Play as Peter Parker and Miles Morales in this PS5-exclusive sequel with dual heroes and Venom.

title: Armored Core VI: Fires of Rubicon
description: FromSoftware returns with high-speed mecha combat, intricate customization, and challenging missions.

title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
description: Open-world survival shooter set in the radioactive Chernobyl Exclusion Zone.

title: Dragon’s Dogma II
description: Sequel to Capcom’s cult-favorite RPG featuring an expansive world, pawn system, and dynamic combat.

title: Black Myth: Wukong
description: A stunning Souls-like based on the legend of the Monkey King, featuring martial arts combat.

title: Silent Hill 2 (Remake)
description: Remake of the psychological horror masterpiece rebuilt in Unreal Engine 5.

title: Metaphor: ReFantazio
description: A fantasy RPG from the creators of Persona, blending social simulation with tactical turn-based combat.

title: Hades II
description: Sequel to the award-winning roguelike, starring Melinoë in a battle against the Titan of Time.

title: Sifu
description: Martial arts action game with a unique aging mechanic as you seek revenge through stylish combat.

title: Atomic Heart
description: First-person shooter set in an alternate Soviet utopia gone mad, full of killer robots and chaos.

title: Lords of the Fallen
description: A dark fantasy action RPG reboot with seamless world design and brutal combat.

title: Manor Lords
description: A medieval city-building and strategy game focused on organic growth and tactical battles.

title: Halo: Campaign Evolved
description: A remake of the original Halo campaign including new content such as prequel missions, new cinematics, weapons from later games, and new voice overs.

title: Megabonk
description: A 3D survival roguelike where players must fight through hordes of enemies and bosses in randomly generated maps.
